events.title: GWIST Build: Robotics & Soldering 101
events.description: Demystifying the hardware lab. A hands-on session for women to master soldering and basic circuit design in a low-pressure, high-support environment.

events.title: The Researcher’s Lens: PhD & Beyond
events.description: An evening with Plaksha’s women faculty. Discussing the transition from undergraduate research to global PhD programs and R&D leadership.

events.title: GWIST Annual Gala: Innovation Showcase
events.description: Our flagship International Women’s Day celebration. Featuring project pitches, technical posters, and a keynote from a trailblazing woman in deep-tech.

events.title: Bio-Tech Brunch: STEM Identity
events.description: Casual conversation about navigating male-dominated labs and building a strong personal brand as a woman in STEM. Bagels and Bio-design included.

events.title: Dev Sprint: Open Source Contribution
events.description: A focused sprint to make your first pull request. We'll guide you through GitHub workflows and contributing to global tech projects.

events.title: Panel: Data Science in Climate Action
events.description: Exploring how women are leading the charge in using Big Data to solve environmental challenges. Featuring guest speakers from UN Women in Tech.
